chunk:
Anokha Bakuchiol & Pomegranate Facial Oil

Brand: Anokha

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Cucumus sativus (cucumber) oil, Punica granatum (pomegranate) seed oil, Vaccinium macrocarpon (cranberry) seed oil, Hippophae rhamnoides (sea buckthorn) seed oil, Rosa mosqueta (rose) hip seed oil, Aleurites moluccana (kukui) nut oil, Alkanna tinctoria (alkanet) root, C12-15 alkyl benzoate, bakuchiol, alpha-bisabolol, tocopheryl

(sea buckthorn) seed oil, Rosa mosqueta (rose) hip seed oil, Aleurites moluccana (kukui) nut oil, Alkanna tinctoria (alkanet) root, C12-15 alkyl benzoate, bakuchiol, alpha-bisabolol, tocopheryl acetate, coenzyme Q10, Rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) extract*
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer
